source.sqlReaderQuery:
;WITH CashFlowRaw
AS (

SELECT [WorkMatter]
      ,[Exposure],
      [ValueName]
      ,[Amount]
       ,[EndUser]
      ,[EndTime], 
	  Cast('2020-03-31' as Date) as Cashflowentryperiod ,
	  EOMONTH(CAST((RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)),2) + '-' +  RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5),2) + '-' +  CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])) as Date)) as CFProjectionsfor,
	  DateDIFF(quarter,Cast('2020-03-31' as Date),EOMONTH(CAST((RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)),2) + '-' +  RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5),2) + '-' +  CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])) as Date))) as datediff
  FROM [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[CashFlowEntry]
  where  (CAST(EndTime AS DATE) IS NULL  or CAST(EndTime AS DATE) = '06/12/2020')
  and  Year !=0 
  and  DateDIFF(quarter,Cast('2020-03-31' as Date),EOMONTH(CAST((RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)),2) + '-' +  RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5),2) + '-' +  CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])) as Date))) in
  ('1','2','3','4','5','6') 

  union

  SELECT [WorkMatter]
      ,[Exposure]
      ,[ValueName]
      ,[Amount]
       ,[EndUser]
      ,[EndTime], 
	  Cast('2020-03-31' as Date) as Cashflowentryperiod ,
	  NULL as CFProjectionsfor,
	  '9999'  as  datediff
  FROM [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[CashFlowEntry]
  where (CAST(EndTime AS DATE) IS NULL  or CAST(EndTime AS DATE) = '06/12/2020')
  and  Year =0
)

, pivotdata as (

select * from (

SELECT [WorkMatter]
			  ,[Exposure],
			  Cashflowentryperiod,
			  CFProjectionsfor
			  ,[ValueName]
			  ,[Amount]
			   ,[EndUser]
			  ,[EndTime]
		FROM CashFlowRaw
		
		
	) AS SourceTable
	PIVOT
	(
		sum(Amount)
		FOR ValueName IN (Loss, DefExp, CovDJ)
	) AS PivotData

	)

	select distinct 
	         p.[WorkMatter]
			,[Exposure],
		    Cashflowentryperiod,
			CFProjectionsfor,
			Sum(Loss) AS Loss, 
			sum(DefExp) AS DefExp,
			sum(CovDJ) AS CovDJ,
			CONVERT(
        VARCHAR(32),
        HashBytes(
            'MD5',
            CONCAT(
                [Exposure],
                ' ',
                p.[WorkMatter],
                ' ',
                CAST([cashFlowEntryPeriod] AS VARCHAR),
                ' ',
                CAST([CFProjectionsfor] AS VARCHAR),
                ' ',
                CAST(Sum(Loss) AS VARCHAR),
                ' ',
                CAST(sum(DefExp) AS VARCHAR),
                ' ',
                CAST(sum(CovDJ) AS VARCHAR)
            )
        ),
        2
    ) as CashFlowHashKey
		    
	from pivotdata P join [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[WorkMatters] w on p.WorkMatter=w.WorkMatter
	join [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[Exposures] e on p.WorkMatter=e.WorkMatter and p.Exposure=e.ExpID
	--where p.WorkMatter='WM000122741'
	group by
	 p.[WorkMatter]
	,[Exposure]
	,Cashflowentryperiod
	,CFProjectionsfor
